rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with minimalistic Scandinavian design, featuring built-in storage and a small reception area.
rooms.vastu_notes: Ensure the door faces north-east for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open plan living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on one side, blending indoor-outdoor living.
rooms.vastu_notes: Windows oriented east to capture morning light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Scandinavian kitchen with smart storage solutions and an island counter. Features energy-efficient appliances.
rooms.vastu_notes: Placed in the northeast section for prosperity.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space adjacent to the living room, featuring light wood finishes and simple decor.
rooms.vastu_notes: Consider a round table layout to encourage unity.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office with ample natural light, soundproofing, and ergonomic furniture. Walls finished in neutral tones.
rooms.vastu_notes: Position near the entrance for accessibility yet away from noisy areas.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-ventilated bathroom with Scandinavian fixtures, tiled floors, and minimalistic design.

openings.name: Front Door
openings.description: Durable Scandinavian-style door with energy-efficient glass panels.

openings.name: Floor-to-Ceiling Window
openings.description: Large window that maximizes natural light and offers an unobstructed view of the outdoors.

openings.name: Kitchen Windows
openings.description: Multiple windows to enhance ventilation and brightness.
